title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 375 - Evaluation Of Plan Benefits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 375 - Evaluation Of Plan Benefits

State Regulations
§ 375.1 - Minimum benefit values
§ 375.2 - Employee benefits only to be evaluated
§ 375.3 - Disability benefits and related benefits only to be evaluated
§ 375.4 - Wages to be used in determining benefit rate
§ 375.5 - Wage continuance plans
§ 375.6 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 375

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 117, 141, 211, 217, 241

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
